news-item.title: Montana: Pesticide Registrar 10036379
news-item.text: Department of Labor & Industry, The State of Montana has issued the following job announcement: 10036379 Job Title: Pesticide Registrar Employer: DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE Location: HELENA MT, 59625 Description: Partial description: This position serves as the Pesticide Registrar for the state and works closely with the Licensing and Registration Section Specialist for the registration and registration renewal of federally registered pesticides, federally exempted pesticides, state registered pesticides, special pesticide registrations, and coordination of federal experimental use permits.This position is responsible for pesticide registrations for Montanarsquo;s agricultural producers, related industries, and public health. The incumbent will work with federal and state pesticide registration processes including risk assessment and risk management related to human health, environmental fate and effects, and threatened and endangered species. Wage: $20.73 - $25.91 Hourly Open
